text_logic_form: The length of the line $XZ$ is 18 units.
The length of the line $PY$ is 3 units.
Find the length of the line $PW$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The length of the line $XZ$ is 18 units.
The length of the line $PY$ is 3 units.
Find the length of the line $PW$.
diagram_logic_form: Point $P$ lies on the line connecting $X$ and $Z$.
Point $P$ also lies on the line connecting $W$ and $Y$.
The length of the line $ZY$ is equal to the length of the line $XW$.
The lines $XY$ and $WZ$ are parallel to each other.
